an10.131:4.1: “Mendicants, these ten things when developed and cultivated don’t lead solely to disillusionment, fading away, cessation, peace, insight, awakening, and extinguishment apart from the Holy One’s training.
an10.131:4.3: Right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right samādhi, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.131:4.5: These are the ten things that when developed and cultivated don’t lead solely to disillusionment, fading away, cessation, peace, insight, awakening, and extinguishment apart from the Holy One’s training.”
